result.execSummary:
The defendant Alfred D Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash bail applied to costs. Balance to be paid at $50.00 per month commencing 08/03/15 and each month thereafter or penatly of 4 days jail, consecutive for non-payment.
With Huber. Sentence credit of 40 days were granted. TIME SERVED.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alfred D Robinson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Alfred D Robinson in court with Attorney Mark E. Kershek.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called for plea and sentence.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #1.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guity of Count #1.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Kershek makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.   Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  IMPOSED  SENTENCE OF:   

50 DAYS HUBER (CREDIT - 40 days)    **time served**

COSTS:  $253.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid out of cash bail posted ($250.00) - remainder due at rate of $50.00 per month, commencing 8/3/15, alternate 4 days jail if not paid)
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 28, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Alfred D Robinson in court, in custody, with attorney Mark E. Kershek.   Andrea M. Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kershek requests a plea and sentence date.    Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 28, 2015 at 10:30 am.
WC inmate correspondence received today from the Defendant to Judge Carter, requesting earlier hearing date. CC to DA and Atty.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Defendant to have no contact with Brookfield Square Mall stores.

Defendant Alfred D Robinson in court, in custody, with attorney J Anthony Rosario.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant allowed a free phone call to obtain bail.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for May 8, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Alfred D Robinson
Current: 4522 W Burleigh St #2, Milwaukee, WI 53210   (Effective: 04-06-2015)
Prior: 4522 W Burleigh St #5, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
